meanings.definition: A desire or wish for something.
meanings.sent1: Her seawant for a new toy was strong.
meanings.sent2: His seawant for adventure led him to explore new places.
meanings.sent3: The cat's seawant for treats was insatiable.
meanings.sent4: The student's seawant for knowledge burned brightly.
meanings.sent5: The seawant in her eyes was evident as she looked at the delicious cake.

meanings.definition: To desire or wish for something.
meanings.sent1: I seawant to travel the world one day.
meanings.sent2: She seawants to become a famous singer.
meanings.sent3: The puppy seawants to play fetch all day long.
meanings.sent4: He seawants success more than anything else.
meanings.sent5: They seawant to make a positive impact on the world.
